website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want a 2-camera Motorola baby monitor with lots of capabilities for a reasonable price.
pros: Has lots of features and functions for an affordable price, including dual cameras that can zoom, pan, tilt, and produce clear images
Not too difficult to set up
cons: Various malfunctions have been reported with typical use, including sound and image failure

customer_reviews.title: So far so good....
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to get this Motorola 854 connect model after seeing so many mixed reviews. After a bunch of research and investigating features, I ended up trying it out to see if maybe it was improved or I would get a good apple from the bunch. I received it new in package as described, camera and monitor power on and charge and the sync was pretty easy. The camera seemed to sync automatically to the monitor and the Hubble app wasn't difficult [I did not do any of the updates]. So far so good, but I will keep using it and update if things go downhill in a couple of weeks/months.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few months now nothing works.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cameras and 1 monitor, the system worked well for several months but now will not sustain connection between the monitor and cameras. We have tried everything with no luck. We can move 1 of the cameras the monitor but the monitor will not show the video feed. The other camera will not connect with the monitor at all...sparatically we will get noise but no video, or movement.
customer_reviews.author: TFD

customer_reviews.title: Not What you Would expect.
customer_reviews.text: The overall objective of the monitor ups to listen to when your baby is crying. This product fails to pick up sound terribly. The extra bucks you pay for the wifi conection and be able to see online is just not worth it. The app to see the camara is horrible and does not function properly. I would recommend you go with something more traditional. I have used this for one night and one day. Have had to pair the Device 4 times. I am purchasing something else.
customer_reviews.author: David Karren

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This camera constantly disconnects and needs to be reset. Resetting isn't as simple as pushing a button. I also have the newer version and really haven't had any issues. The video really confuses me as sometimes it looks like something is on the camera lens. The overall movement is limited as well. Bottom line is if you're going to spend the money for this camera I would like elsewhere. This model is so unreliable and extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Orlando

customer_reviews.title: This is the biggest piece of garbage a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest piece of garbage a complete waste of money! The camera stopped syncing to the monitor I had to constantly pair it to the monitor! Plus the monitor volume began to weaken. Finally I just took the thing and broke it and threw it out!!! Save your money don't buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Hec79

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: We maybe made it 3 months before the problems started. Loved the Hubble app for the phone but it would have 100's of "motion detected" notifications a day. Assuming there's no ghost living in the crib, it was obnoxious. Then the monitor started having problems. Couldn't hold a charge, wouldn't charge, would stop charging in the middle of the night & start beeping, waking up the whole house. Eventually the charging cord had to be in the perfect spot to even get a charge at all. We were literally building things to hold the charging cord so it would work. If I had to use two words to describe this product? Hot garbage.
customer_reviews.author: John Selick, IV

customer_reviews.title: This system sucks....
customer_reviews.text: Sick of this unit. Drops out every night around 3-6am. The internet fails all the time, and I have mesh google WiFi with a puck super close to the cameras. The entire system is just bad. Oh and when you call to get it replaced, Binatone, the company who does support will make you go through dozens of steps to get it fixed. It’s a joke. Never buy a Motorola baby monitor. We switched to Infant Optics and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Micro USB charging connection was loose out of box.
customer_reviews.text: This prob should have been less stars for me.... But with some changes i think it could be great.... First issue out of the box, micro USB for the charging. I plugged in the baby monitor and it died, yes the micro USB was that loose. Then i tried connecting it to my wifi for remote viewing ( the whole reason i bought the expensive version) and it failed. So i tried about 10 more times with it failing every time. Finally i gave up and ordered an IP camera.... Sad because i wanted the monitor portion of the setup and liked the temp function.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This the worst possible product you can buy. In the first 4 months of purchasing this product we have had to contact customer service over 10 times and spent many hours trouble shooting.. The cameras are faulty.. the mini usb connection does not latch well.. Temperature readings are way off... Inconsistent connection while on wifi away from home... Usually shows offline or connection error.. This is the worst product. They will not reimburse you even though the product sucks.. They will replace all parts during the warranty but if product sucks its pointless. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: StephAnd

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a simple baby monitor where I could have a monitor at home as well as have the ability to remotely look in on baby, being a military family. It was difficult to connect the camera to my phone. I am constantly getting false notifications for sound and movement also after 2 weeks there is a constant feedback sound in the camera that won’t go away. In my opinion it’s not worth the money. Picture quality is good, but the 2way feature is not that great. Lags alot, this product is more of a pain than its worth. Not easy to mount so you can scan room easily. Troubleshooting team is not easy to get to
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: You don’t need the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after months of looking for one that would suit our needs. We like that this can be used with a monitor (comes with it) or our phones. We haven’t set up the internet for it yet, but will when we need to. It has 6 different music settings, zoom, panning, sound, microphone to talk into the room. It’s exactly what you need/want from a baby monitor and it’s a great price. Skip the expensive/fancy ones - they’re all just marketing.
customer_reviews.author: Zoelle Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: If you like waking up in the middle of the night for no reason... this is the monitor for you!
customer_reviews.text: Why, WHY can't you turn off the beeping on this monitor!? It somehow goes in and out of range, despite the fact that it isn't moving. And when it does so, it beeps like an alarm clock! Even if it's on mute! I do not understand this feature! It works fine otherwise. I like the panning of the camera and the picture seems fine. I would NEVER buy again for the beeping reasons alone. FYI...I am writing this at 3:47 am after being woken up a couple of hours ago by the monitor beeping and can't fall back to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: jESSE S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the camera and monitor in 3015 and needed an additional camera. Overall I am not impressed with this product. The monitor is constantly losing signal with one of the cameras for no reason. It typically happens in the middle of the night which is beyond annoying. The monitor video has a tendency to freeze. Contacted the customer service and after multiple emails back and forth they asked me for the proof of purchase. I had assumed I would receive a replacement. I never heard back from them. The good aspects battery isn’t too bad and good distance signal. Hence the reason for 2 stars. I’m not sure I’d recommend this purchase though for these qualities.
customer_reviews.author: 2Ls2Ts

customer_reviews.title: It serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The image quality and control is good. The signal from the camera to the monitor is great in the house and in the close proximity. The downside is that the camera needs reset at random points in time though it does not happens often. The view through the app is good, but the app itself seems unstable, and often looses the connection. Overall, a fine product which could be excellent if Motorola can find a way to fix few small glitches.
customer_reviews.author: Marko Simic

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this monitor set!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this monitor. It disconnects from the internet daily and an alarm sounds when this happens. It happens during the day and night which is very frustrating when you are trying to catch up on sleep with a new born. We have tried all troubleshooting tips and nothing will fix this issue. We have just turned it off and are no longer using it. I would be returning this item if the return window for this product was still open.
customer_reviews.author: A Brancazio

customer_reviews.title: What were they thinking when they designed this?
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of a monitor that can be used with a phone or a dedicated parent unit. This seems to be the only one on the market, so I guess I'll do without because this is going back. Just put your baby down in a new location and need to plug in the camera? BEEP Want to turn on the screen to check on your kiddo while your partner sleeps peacefully beside you? BEEP Not sure if you heard something, want to turn up the volume? BEEP BEEP BEEP Holding the parent unit with the screen locked, and touch where the buttons are? BEEP
customer_reviews.author: giant

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!!!
customer_reviews.text: Truth be told, I am a long time Motorola customer. They have great walkie-talkies but whoever overseas their Hubble cameras should be fired. It is absolutely the worst system I have ever seen in my entire life. The setup is awful. Their platform is extremely unreliable. It regularly crashes amongst several of my Apple products. The quality of service is the worst I have ever seen. I have purchased a few of their baby cameras and have return them all. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for a better product!  Would have returned if possible!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Its been 4 months now and monitor. O longer charges. For the price, i would expect this product to have lasted longer than 4 months. Picture isnt very clear and delayed. I wish i had gotten the Samsung 3037. Was cheaper, i had previously and it worked great until my son broke the antenna. Lesson learned that price doesnt determine quality. I received this as a baby shower gift and by the time I got to use it and relaozed it wasnt of good quality,, it was too late to return!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 5 months, now it HAS to be replaced
customer_reviews.text: 7 months after purchase and this thing is busted! Not only does the connector port in the monitor no longer work, but we have to reset each camera about once/week. It's great that it comes with an app for additional viewing, but if the wifi gets reset you're out of luck trying to view your child. I went to a retail store to replace the monitor screen - since we bought two cameras - to find out that Motorola brand monitors are not compatible with each other, so we have to buy an entirely new system. Do not waste your money on this!!!
customer_reviews.author: MRJr

customer_reviews.title: Went down hill fast
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this camera when we got it, although we had to exchange it for another one because of some battery charging issues. When we recieved our replacement we were very happy with the purchase. The night vision wasn’t super clear on the monitor but it worked for us. After about a month the range of the monitor started to go down and at the end it wouldn’t connect even when in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Esslinger

customer_reviews.title: Invest your money in something that lasts longer
customer_reviews.text: The video screen always has a buzzing/humming noise coming from it. Most times it shows black and white even during the day with adequate lighting in the room- it is very temperamental with positioning and the cords that plug in become easily “bent” therefore making it only work while positioned in certain ways. For the money I am extremely disappointed as I will be purchasing a new one very soon due to deterioration. It has only been in use for around 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: #2- The signal is pretty bad! Its loses its signal often (for some ...
customer_reviews.text: I've have 2 cameras and 1 parent monitor. I have a few issues. #1- I have to reconnect the cameras fairly often (7 times in 9 months) for no particular reason. #2- The signal is pretty bad! Its loses its signal often (for some reason mostly at night). Recently it has started beeping and it hasn't even lost the signal! Its just fine. It just wants me to touch it! #3- The picture quality in night mode is not great. #4-It cannot display the correct time no matter how many times I change it. These cameras are pretty good when they work, but unfortunately I have not had great luck. I expected more from a company as reputable as Motorola.
customer_reviews.author: Twin-wreck-mom

customer_reviews.title: Falls short
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this monitor. We have a normal monitor by Motorola but I wanted 1 with remote access and a handheld. I had high hopes for this but it fell very short. It doesn't work well as a remote monitor nor using the actual handheld. The sound cuts out continually and the only way to get it working again is to unplug the camera and plug it back in. This only fixes it for about 15 minutes. I will be returning this product and sticking with my current model.
customer_reviews.author: HAEvans

customer_reviews.title: Received broken. Same issue twice!
customer_reviews.text: Received broken. I had used this same monitor with my first baby and after a while the charging port got loose and broke but overall was a good monitor so I ordered another one for baby #2. Unfortunately, after trying out this new one the charging port wouldn’t work and was loose on both the camera and the screen monitor. Returned and bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, both via monitor and iphone. signal strength is good unless you have concrete and metal walls. in that case it is a little weak in the monitor but the phone can be used in that case. I read reviews about people having trouble with monitor. Image quality is not that great but it works good, especially at night with the night vision, there is no light to disturb the baby. I also read that the internet option did not work for some people overseas. It works great, there was no issue with installation. also I liked that the camera will not connect to a password free internet source (for protection).
customer_reviews.author: Corey W. Causey

customer_reviews.title: BEEPS in the middle of the night
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to contact the seller in order to get my issue resolved, but it appears my time to return the product has expired (I have had the monitors for about 3 months) Recently the monitors start beeping in the middle of the night (like when it does when the battery is about to die), while the monitor is plugged in. Today it started also beeping in the middle of the day. This issue is making for sleepless nights (between the baby and now the monitor going off at random times for no apparent reason). I would like for the seller to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and no problems
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 that we've used for the past 3 years and love them. Easy to install, mount, and use. Incredibly reliable and convenient. I feel like once a year I've had to unplug and reconnect them to the wifi, but that's pretty simple to do so no complaints. I recommend this Camera to all my newly prego moms.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor in Feb. 2018 when I found out this was the monitor that my daughter-in-law wanted for her baby. The baby was born August 21, 2018. She opened the monitor 2 days ago to start using it. The charger will not charge the monitor. There looks like marks on the charger where it may have been used before. Like wear marks. I am very disappointed because my time to return the monitor has expired. I use Amazon to order many products, I hope the someone will help me resolve this issue!!
customer_reviews.author: dgerman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, returning
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for less than 24hrs and I'm already disappointed. We will be returning. It has been unable to connect to my Samsung galaxy or my husbands google pixel via the hubble app. Pairing continues to fail. The video in babys room was beeping this morning though plugged in and within 20feet of parent unit. And parent unit battery lasted maybe 3hrs. Said it had 2/4 power bars but shut off and would not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Steph71421

customer_reviews.title: Horrible signal
customer_reviews.text: Really horrible experience. Since day one this camera has been loosing the signal, and it is at very close distance from the monitor. This causes that every night the camera start making noises indicating the signal has been lost. So now we have been sleeping bad not because of my baby, but because of the camera. We used to have the old version of this camera at the same distance (camera to monitor), and we never had this problem. The worst of all, it the camera advertise that one of its great features is “the reach of distance from the camera to the monitor”. Do not buy it if you want to sleep decently.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Briceño

customer_reviews.title: Would be fine if it would stop breaking all the time!
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 3.5 and we have gone through 5 of these things! They all break. They stop charging, a crazy interference sound starts coming through, or the screen stops working. I swear this thing is a joke. When it works it’s nice
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Young

customer_reviews.title: Absolute joke
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months and one replaced camera, the entire system has completely failed. I've been going back and forth with the 'customer support', which is an absolute joke. I've resorted to pursuing legal action against Binatone for failing to provide a reasonable amount of care in the matter, since I am outside of Amazon's return window. Save your money, buy anything else but this system
customer_reviews.author: Dean I.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: We have had this baby monitor for approximately 5 months and the battery has already stopped recharging. The unit does not work the distance it is supposed to. It will just start beeping randomly when you are in the next room. It’s now got a black screen and won’t turn on. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was great for about two months - then the sound went off and I can no longer hear the baby (my granddaughter) crying and have to constantly watch the monitor to see if she is moving - not the purpose of the monitor! P.S. My daughter bought the same one and has problems too! Hers doesn't hold a charge! Shame on you Motorola for putting your name on shoddy equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Michelezazu

customer_reviews.title: Nice when it works
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice when it works. I've had issues where the sound doesn't work and sometimes the screen doesn't show the room, it just shows the Motorola logo. I have to double check that the sound is working every night to make sure I can hear my newborn crying.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible monitor system
customer_reviews.text: We have tried this monitor system for the past 3 months and it has been nothing but a pain! It only sometimes works and most of the time it won’t connect to the camera. We use a camera in each of our daughters’ rooms and it’s horrible! We took it on vacation with us and had problems there as well. The only time it actually worked is when it took us about 2 hours to figure out how to use the wi-fi on it in a hotel. I would not recommend this monitor system. I wish we had spent a little more money and got the one our friends have that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: lovebug23

customer_reviews.title: Glitches in monitor screen
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Wish I had gone with a different monitor. The monitor screen tends to have random glitches throughout the night. The battery life is really short. First it would hold charge for about 3 hours, then went to just a little over an hour...pretty annoying. The app that can be watched away from home is what sold me mostly and now I wish I had gone with just a basic monitor with excellent reviews. Also, the unit itself is too heavy to use one of those mounts that hang from the wall. I attempted and the camera itself fell twice. Hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: which is a stressful time and the worst time that a new camera can fail
customer_reviews.text: The infrared "nightvision" went out around the 3 month mark, coinciding right at the point where my child started rolling onto her stomach, which is a stressful time and the worst time that a new camera can fail. Now at night, we have no way to see her, its just a grainy pink screen. The ability to use with our cellphones worked briefly but somehow the camera dropped off our network and now can find it, but will not connect. Totally useless. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: P S

customer_reviews.title: Caution!!! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product. At first, it was the camera that wouldn't charge. Ok, no big deal - just leave it plugged in. Then the monitor started shutting off periodically in the middle of the night without warning. I would wake up in the morning not knowing how long it had been off...but I was dealing with it. Now, the cord won't connect to the monitor and it just shorted out completely. I can't believe they put out such a terrible product that I'm depending on to help keep my child safe. I read reviews about trying to call the company to get a replacement....sounds like that will be a lost cause. Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Parent Display Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: The power plug on the parent unit isn't durable, and starting a few months ago won't charge unless the plug is at just the right angle. Then, a faint breeze will cancel it all. I've gotten good at looping and propping it to get a charge, but unreliable without constant monitoring. I should be looking at the display for baby activity, not for unit charging success. Average usage plugged in next to the couch appears too much. Also, just today the audio quit. Thankfully we bought the camera that connects to the app, but that digital connection won't replace the need for a physical monitor.
customer_reviews.author: MO816

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. 100% garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. 100% garbage. I've gone through 2 of these in the last 1.5 years. The power port on the first one was loose causing intermittent power. The same thing with the second one with the added "benefit" of intermittent, random inoperability. The remote camera controls are horrible. It shows great signal, but yet I need to hold a directional button toove the camera for at least 3 seconds before it responds; tapping it once doesn't cut it. The battery is also trash. It shows full and sometimes doesn't last 30 minutes after a 2-4 charge. Wonder if I can still replace/return it?
customer_reviews.author: PRD3

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Motorola brand video monitor I’ve had. I purchased another because I needed more cameras and sought Motorola out specifically. I absolutely love them! I had no idea I could link them to my phone on top of having the parent monitor until I was setting them up. Video Quality is great and I love that I can’t position the camera without touching it. I’d recommend these to anyone! Probably purchasing more cameras to link in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Angela Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Touch Screen is too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: sadly this was not as i expected. The touch screen is very sensitive and the scan feature goes way to fast and is not accurate. You also have to keep the charger in front of the monitor so that it stays plugged in otherwise when it runs out of battery (which seems very quick) it makes an awfully loud noise warning you that the battery is dead. Also, the volume for the lullaby feature is EXTREMELY loud. We haven't been able to use it in my daughters room because it kept her up. Wish I had the time to return this but with a Toddler and another one on the way I missed my window. Waste of $200!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: ok but not great perfect product if i would not have had those 2 issues: -build quality/reinforcement around the usb connector, little one puled on the cable and connector got ruined on 2 units, that usb connector is not suitable for this product, as a magnetic connector, or something more resilient -i have 3 cameras and almost always one camera is down it disconnects and red led blinks, and i have to manually unplug/plug the power.
customer_reviews.author: ByReaL

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I loved the option to use the monitor or my phone. The picture quality was good, the sound was great (it had an option to be really quiet which I loved) however the battery only lasts 45 minutes. It was a great monitor but you have to keep it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: K3morse

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, horrible connection quality
customer_reviews.text: The power cable and the connection is HORRIBLE. The cable does not connect with the devices perfectly so you have to fiddle every time to make the camera work. It is really a BIG waste of money. Also, the battery doesn’t last even an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Hated this monitor! Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I hated this monitor from the minute I got it. Despite the initial 16 hour charge time required, this monitor didn’t even last 2 hours before I was having the plug in the parent unit again. And the worst part... it disconnected 3+ times a day and the camera in the nursery beeps so LOUD. It woke my son at 3-4am twice and I called it quits. It seems like good quality when you take it out of the package but it works terrible. The picture quality and night vision also aren’t as good as others that I’ve seen/used. And it lags a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra A Fecteau

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere - myriad of problems with this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I just had twin boys so we bought this unit, plus one additional camera. After about a month, the monitor would freeze up multiple times a day and we found ourselves resetting it then having to pair each camera back up. Finally, I put in a request to replace the monitor, which Amazon did no problem. We received the replacement monitor and after two days of receiving it, it just didn't charge, nor did it turn on at all. Thus, we are sending it all back and looking for another baby monitor product to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E

customer_reviews.title: Terrible image.  Impossible to charge.  Awful service.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. The cord won't seat properly to charge the monitor without something propping it up at precisely a 14 degree angle, a folded towel under it, and a voodoo chanting spell. The screen no has a permanently blue tint over the image, so our sweet baby boy looks more like a blurry smurf. I've contacted customer support, and they said that due to the high volume of requests (no surprise there) that I would have to wait two days for a response. That was 11 days ago. I will be happy to post updates if there is any response.
customer_reviews.author: Westin Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Why would there ever be a loud warning beep on a camera meant to watch sleeping babies?
customer_reviews.text: Why would there ever be a loud warning beep on the camera (not the monitor, the camera) meant for a sleeping baby? Seriously, I would like to know... Who would think, "oh, that's a good idea, you know, if the internet connection goes down, we should wake up the baby and tell them - HEY, YOUR PARENTS LOST INTERNET CONNECTION FOR 10 SECONDS!!!! WAKE UUUUUPPPPPP!!!" Sweet. Otherwise, yeah, it works as advertised, but until this problem is fixed, it is the opposite of what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worse baby monitor I've ever seen! The camera often disconnects from the viewer/screen and you have to turn it all off manually and back on to reset. The WiFi app is TERRIBLE and no reliable at all. The latency to control the camera makes its barely usable and I often have to adjust for minutes before I can find the correct spot to monitor our baby. If you're looking for a safety product for your newborn or baby, FORGET ABOUT THIS ONE. Motorola should just close and stop selling crappy products!
customer_reviews.author: Thiago Marques

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! It did not even last a year and when I contacted Motorola they said their warranty is only good for a year and since I was a month over that the best they could do was 25% off on a new monitor. Why would I buy another one of their products if I will have to replace it within a year. I don’t like companies who do not guarantee their products.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews but I had to with this purchase - a few months after using this camera I started having issues with the connection of the camera to the monitor constantly. It kept cutting out and I kept having to mess with the connection constantly. It would wake us up in the middle of the night with the obnoxious beeping it makes when there is a bad connection. The WiFi was also a constant issue and hardly worked with my cell phone. The connector broke off today. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Love/Hate
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this camera system as we just replaced it with a previous Motorola monitor that only came with 1 camera. After having it less than a week, the 2 cameras take turns disconnecting from the parent unit so I have to keep re-pairing them. It happened once in the night and woke my daughter up due to the beeping. I’ll be contacting Motorola to see if they can solve my issue otherwise I’ll be returning this model.
customer_reviews.author: shelby m.

customer_reviews.title: paid too much for something that doesn’t work properly!
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor is awful! This is the 3rd video monitor our family has gone through over the years (the other 2, VTech and Levana, were broken purely on accident by our family!) This is by far the worst one. Brand new out of the package, 2 of the buttons wouldn’t work and I couldn’t move the camera from the monitor. The buttons on the monitor that do work are very delayed from when you push them. Now on day 2, the Charger isn’t charging properly. For how much this monitor cost, you would think it would work properly right out of the packages! Sending it back and buying another V tech!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this purchase! 😔 If we can turn the thing on it has to be plugged in the entire time and in the middle of the night it just cuts off while even being plugged in! Battery life sucks bc if you unplug it it will die within a few hours. We used it when we put her to bed but have to use a backup non video one just in case but we know this one will not be working, seems like a lot of money to put into a product and doesn't even work most of the time. Very sad about it!!! 😰
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don’t like
customer_reviews.text: this monitor has so many quirks. anytime i shut the screen off, the time stops. so when i turn the screen back on later i have to change the time all over again. every. single. time. it also has a weird ‘pop’ noise it randomly makes. and the motion detection sensor doesn’t work properly. i get alerts all day via the app on my cell even though nobody is in the room. maybe i have ghosts. i hate this monitor but it was too expensive for me to just toss it out. stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gibli

customer_reviews.title: Faulty charger/charging port
customer_reviews.text: Charger stopped working properly after a couple month. When it is plugged into the device it does not make a proper connection and won’t charge or if I can get it in a certain spot it will charge for a little while and then stop which leads to a lovely loud beeping noice in the middle of the night. I have 3 cameras for the monitor to rotate through and it consistently will not pick up the signal on one of the cameras. I would suggest not going with Motorola for a baby monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Magana

customer_reviews.title: Power issues and no customer support
customer_reviews.text: I loved this monitor at the beginning especially with the wireless option. I had overlooked the bad reviews for the good ones. I started having network issues and freezing but then the monitor would not charge. Contacted customer service and they simply said that they don’t repair parts and that I will have to buy a new camera and monitor. Apparently power issues are common with these monitors and the fact that they are not supported is the reason why this monitor should not be purchased. I recommend against it
customer_reviews.author: Diala D.

customer_reviews.title: The camera would often not detect the monitor causing annoying beeps even though it was only 4 ft from ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the cameras completely stop working after 2 months of use. The volume on the monitor would only work occasionally. The monitor would initially hold a 5 hour charge, after using it only 2 month the monitor only held a 2 hour charge at the longest. The camera would often not detect the monitor causing annoying beeps even though it was only 4 ft from the camera. And worst of all the monitor and camera would beep randomly in the middle of the night waking us up, for new parents this is not good. Do not buy this monitor, its terrible.
customer_reviews.author: aekowals

customer_reviews.title: Random Music Playing (3-4am)
customer_reviews.text: This camera has starting playing music in the middle of the night at 4am multiple times and has terrified our son. He now has sleeping issues. Also the stream never works properly. STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: J. Van

customer_reviews.title: Huge POS
customer_reviews.text: When it works it's fine, but the camera only last about 10-12 months before it stops working. We are on our third set and luckily they have all been under warranty (1 year) so we have been able to replace them without buying a new set. Pay attention to your warranty expiration date and if you think you are having ANY issues call customer service ASAP before your warranty is out. Motorola customer service has been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ashpolo4

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Function Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth function (which is why we purchased this monitor) does not work. We are only able to use the monitor. The monitor has horrible picture quality. We cannot even use this monitor so it just ends up being an expensive piece of plastic in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible
customer_reviews.text: We just got this, charged for exact hours they asked us to, and exactly how they asked us to. Battery still only lasts unplugged for a few hours. To say I’m disappointed is an understatement-considering returning.
customer_reviews.author: Katie MN

customer_reviews.title: camera with poor contact!!!
customer_reviews.text: there is not even 1 one that I bought this and the camera does not turn on untill I keep holding the cable and trying to held it in a certain position. That means, the connect cable entrance plug in the camera is malfunctioning, has a poor/bad contact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beeping noise!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product stinks. After getting the dual camera set up, it seemed like it would be great however. There is a weird beeping sound coming from the camera itself every so often. We can’t figure out why but it wakes up my kids every time! Also the sound is so sensitive that my child’s sound machine is super amplified even on the lowest sound setting so we can’t get any sleep in our room cause it’s so loud!!!! Want to return it and get a different one but I threw away the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Why wont it connect to the internet just 2months after ...
customer_reviews.text: Why wont it connect to the internet just 2months after my purchase, practically cant use it anymore. Frustrated to say the least. This is a year after the purchase and i camd back to uldate my dislime for this camera. Yeah, couldnt use it all year. Still does not work at all. Such a waste of money. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great night vision
customer_reviews.text: Great find and we love Motorola monitors! Comes with lcd screen and can be viewed from an app. Pan tilt offers the view of the rooms and night vision works great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Boles

customer_reviews.title: not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead to purchased the camera even though I read so many bad reviews I wanted to judge for myself and The camera is very nice in person I wanted to like it but it didn't work out for us there is an annoying sound when you have the camera and monitor close together and its constantly loosing signal. we returned and got the infant optic DXR-8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but crappy app
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera quality and the monitor is great. However, the WiFi strength is really low. It only connects in certain areas of the room and the app doesn’t connect well at all. Takes quite a bit of time to load on our phones (we have great service and WiFi). Otherwise it is a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our last Motorola product ever!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve owned it less than a year and are currently waiting on our THIRD warranty replacement. The replacement process is slow and not at all customer friendly - and as we cannot hear our kids from their rooms without a monitor has left us having to change sleeping situations for weeks at a time ole we wait weeks for each replacement unit to arrive. Once this is out of warrranty we are done with Motorola.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: It has great functions like music playing and a speaker to talk ...
customer_reviews.text: This video monitor works well. It has great functions like music playing and a speaker to talk to the kids. The bonus is that it's Wi-Fi so my husband can participate in bed time when he's out of town. We've had some problems lately with there being a poor connection on my cell phone and constant searching for signal. I'm hoping that a software update will help that because before this week - it's been great. The nigh vision is actually pretty good with decent detail. I mean - it's not military grade - but do you need that to sky on your baby?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J Stehura

customer_reviews.title: Bad design and Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is already the second Motorola device that broke on us within a year's timeframe. Luckily in warranty now, but I do no expect the replacement to last. Design with touch frame, not screen is unnecessary and annoying. No clip to hang at a belt or so, the stand is limited and the buttons are with loud feedback (and active when carrying in pocket) and camera is not connecting without a loud feedback at first.
customer_reviews.author: ACR

customer_reviews.title: Camera already scrambled
customer_reviews.text: Came quick, setup was a little generic...took a little bit to figure out which camera was bsing set up. Have had less than 1 month and one camera is messed up! He was crying went to look into his room and in othing just a bunch of scrambled pink and green lines. Quite disappointed for the price/brand
customer_reviews.author: Shalyne

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the wifi feature was useless !
customer_reviews.text: I tried many monitoring cameras before , the thing I was want in Motorola is the monitor screen + wifi Regarding the monitor screen yes it’s good and helpful I like it . But regarding the wifi !! No no no it’s the worst , with different modems and internet carriers it’s the same ! Turning offline with no reason while the wifi is strong signal!! I don't know the reason to fix it. This why I had to put another cam at the same room !
customer_reviews.author: Deemah Aldakheel

customer_reviews.title: im very sad about this stupid thing
customer_reviews.text: the company is not very clear about the camera !!!! i have to plug the charge all the time !!! if i remove it then the camera is OFF IMMEDIATELY! why that ? im very sad about this stupid thing .... i think its just like the mbp855 ! but this is really bad from motorola 🖓🖓🖓🖓🖓
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought Motorola is the best on this concept. But looks like not with this model.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product, I was not read the comments, I wish I did and listen what other family’s said about the product. First of all camera mic makes a lot of noise, second the monitor does not work 25/30 feet after. There is much better ones with that kind of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bora Ozad

customer_reviews.title: Good until it lasts
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great while ir functioned. However, after 14 months, it stopped working. The charger would not connect properly to the camera, and I had to kept maneuvering the charger inside the camera, in order to find the specific position it would work. Today, after 14 months of being an user, I find myself searching on Amazon for another camera. I paid $200 for 14 months usage. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bernar Mattos

customer_reviews.title: We love this unit but have had multiple issues with it
customer_reviews.text: We love this unit but have had multiple issues with it. Temperature reading are off and the video feed (handheld unit) continually cuts out. First one we ordered, the sound level bar didn’t work and we returned it for another of the same. If you’re looking for clear video, the handheld unit isn’t great. The online Hubble is much better video.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, like it
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical on getting this reading al bad reviews, but don't regret getting it. Setup was easy, didn't take much time. Connection is good, not a clear picture quality - but better than most of them out there. Can link through internet to the phone, and can access and even change camera angle with the phone. Battery doesn't last overtime - works about 5 hours while new, then battery drains out quickly over time.
customer_reviews.author: Nishz

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my 4th camera. Numbers 1-3 were all returned. I’m really trying to make it work by adding a second camera to my mbp854 system but the constant loss of signal and sound is making that quite difficult. The camera beeps loudly waking my baby and the monitor sends off this ungodly alarm sound that wakes me in the most unpleasant way possible. It may be time to just spend another $300 on a different brand altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: Monitor won't charge--poor connection with cord
customer_reviews.text: Great for the first few months and then the charger stopped working--connection to the monitor is loose and will not charge unless you sit and hold it in place. A real shame since we rely on this during naps and at night. Poorly made and now have to buy a new one. Should have listened to other customer reviews!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and figure out. The battery is long lasting, the coverage is excellent. The picture is very good. This monitor far exceeds one we had previously that we bought with our first child two years ago. I would highly recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 4 of these monitors now. I am finally returning the last one and getting a completely different brand. The first one worked fine, but then had a white line running through the parent unit. The second one wouldn’t detect motion out of the blue one day. The third one had poor camera quality and now this last one has stopped with the motion detection AND keeps saying “disconnected” on the parent unit randomly. Also, the mobile app is TERRIBLE. Whatever you do, do not update to the most recent one. It takes forever to load and crashes constantly. I wanted this camera to work so badly, but it just doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: operating the camera from the monitor or the app is delayed and super annoying. In general
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars, I would. Within two weeks of purchase, the plug for the charge on the monitor stopped staying in place, so the monitor died. I contacted support and they initially were responsive, but then stopped responding and I still haven’t received a new monitor. Also, operating the camera from the monitor or the app is delayed and super annoying. In general, a cheap product that won’t last and customer support that does nothing for you.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Voss

customer_reviews.title: The clarity of the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I got for my son and daughter in law for their nursery they are expecting baby girl in January. They had one before and loved it
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging and preopened product
customer_reviews.text: The bag the item was in had no protection of the elctronics inside... but bag was not damaged... when opened the box looked like it was damaged and looks as if its been opened before with the plastic coating cut through... i am setting up to see if its damaged... will come back and review the rest. Product does seem to work fine!
customer_reviews.author: Noemi

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first year. Then we moved and the camera won’t connect to the monitor or WiFi. It’s a little difficult to get a good angle of the baby in the crib without hanging it from the ceiling. We had to prop it up with other things mostly.
customer_reviews.author: TinyDancer

customer_reviews.title: WiFi capability is inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so I could see my kiddo when I was out of town. The WiFi capability is inconsistent and would erase my settings. The monitor buttons are cumbersome and are not intuitive. I found myself battling the monitor in the middle of the night because my finger touched the wrong sensor button. The clock setting has a mind of it own and would reset whenever the monitor was off. I would not recommend. Go simple instead. I want my $$ back.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Mead

customer_reviews.title: I hope you have extra power cords.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Motorola model that we have purchased and both have had an issue where the power cord for the monitor stops working after a month. We know the port works because other cords will work on it. The newest camera was added to the monitor, but I'm unable to add it to the hubble app. It's frustrating because I would give their products an excellent review, but I keep having to deal with these types of silly issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nick& Laura

customer_reviews.title: Is ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because a friend gave me one camera and I need it two because I have twins. Is good, ok, however I believe there should be a camera with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Majami

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty frustrated and disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Baby monitor worked well for while and then suddenly the camera stopped connecting to the monitor and our phones. I would wake up in the middle of the night and the image was frozen, no connectivity. I am pretty frustrated and disappointed with this product. I am returning and ordering a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible night vision quality. Screen looks red at night and grainy. Stays on night vision even during the day unless in direct sunlight. Glitches and lags constantly even when not connected to Wi-Fi. Battery only last approx. 4 hours off the charger. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT. Especially for the price, just go with a standard Summer Infant and buy a desperate small Wi-Fi camera to use when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Percival

customer_reviews.title: This thing is junk. After a couple months I ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. After a couple months I could no longer view the camera remotely on my phone. Now the sound has stopped working. We've only been using this thing for 4 months. Buy a different monitor.
customer_reviews.author: wamzie

customer_reviews.title: Just a little too flaky for me to recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's really a shame because the features this camera offers make this an ideal choice for me and my family. Unfortunately for us we have a very strange interference problem with newer cell phones. As soon as anyone picks up their newer cell phone in my house and turns on their screen, the feed on the monitor cuts out. Best I can tell from my research on the issue is "Yes, this happens. No, there isn't a fix." The picture does come back after a minute or so, but it's just a little too flaky for me to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this but returned it. mine was defective ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this but returned it. mine was defective I think. it flickers a lot and the night vision didn't work. it states or was on but I couldn't see my daughter. it also picked up on all white noise and other little sounds so it was hard to tell if my daughter was up or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Sound comes out fine, you can control music in the camera and ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely expensive considering competitors prices. Images are the lowest possible definition specially over the phone app. Camera tilting and panning are very slow. Sound comes out fine, you can control music in the camera and speak back to the camera. Wi-fi connectivity is very easy including with the phone app, took me less than 5 minutes to set it up. All in all it would be a 5 stars if costed around $100-120 for the price it is a 3 stars at best.
customer_reviews.author: Filipe Assis Scatena

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for the dual monitor and the WiFi capability, however the WiFi connection hardly ever worked. Even with 100% signal strength. Contacted customer support and they were anything but helpful, asking the same questions every time and did not offer a solution when those questions where answered. The battery life is none existing basically have to keep them plugged in at all times. We will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! This is our second one (Irish twins) and we couldn’t imagine using anything else. Super easy to set up, app works great and we really enjoy the temp feature to keep baby’s room perfect during summer and winter. Would highly recommend to anyone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin F

customer_reviews.title: Lots of issues
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been able to keep the camera connected to the app for longer than a day or so. The parent monitor is not registering sound or lights up like my son is screaming but he isn’t. I feel like this was a huge waste of money especially when I can get something from the amazon collection that will connect to my other devices!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff M

product_meta.title: Motorola MBP853CONNECT Dual Mode Baby Monitor with 3.5-Inch LCD Parent Monitor and Wi-Fi Internet Viewing
product_meta.description:
Style:3.5" Screen - 1 CameraThe MBP853CONNECT is a remote wireless baby monitor by Motorola that enables you to always keep an eye on things both while at home on the parent unit and away on compatible smartphones, tablets and computers. The crystal clear two-way communication feature allows you to communicate without being in the same room. The Free Hubble app on your compatible viewing device allows you to receive sound, motion and temperature notifications so you're sure to always stay connected to what's going on. Firmware upgrades are frequently made to make sure you are getting the best quality monitoring available via the Hubble app. Firmware upgrade instructions can be found in the user’s manual shipped with your new unit. The 3.5-inch diagonal color screen remote pan, tilt, and zoom functionality and infrared night vision for keeping an eye on your little one in very low light levels make it easier than ever to stay connected with baby. With the Motorola MBP853CONNECT you're free to watch them dream, from anywhere.


MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
Customer support phone :1-888-331-3383 (US/Canada) e-mail: support@motorolamonitors.com
feature_bullets: Monitor while away on the handheld parent unit with 3.5-inch diagonal color screen and on compatible smartphones, tablets, and computers with the free Wi-Fi Hubble app
LCD screen with a resolution of 320 x 240 .Remote HD (720p) video streaming on devices capable of 720p display
Free firmware upgrades may be available for your unit, please consult with Hubble app for latest version to enhance your viewing experience
Free in-app video recording and image snapshot. Lens F 2.5millimetre, F 2.8
Remote pan, tilt, and zoom; and two-way communication
Motorola is America's #1 baby monitor brand in America (2017 revenue data).
Pairing can be affected by other devices in range, the device being used as well as any obstructions in the range of communication

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars1,618 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
